price: 56. Évoque aussi Idrîs dans le Livre. C’était un (homme) véridique et un Prophète.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِدۡرِيسَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقٗا نَّبِيّٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi id'rīsa innahu kāna ṣiddīqan nabiyyan
